mapper.insert: INSERT INTO User (name, id, pass, gender, email, nickname) values( #{name}, #{id}, #{pass}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{nickname})
mapper.update: UPDATE User SET email = #{email}, nickname = #{nickname}, pass = #{pass} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM User order by id
SELECT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM User where id = #{id}) as success
SELECT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM User where email = #{email}) as success
